org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal

Class BaseProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal.BaseProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPropertyProvider, AbstractResourceProvider, AlertSummaryPropertyProvider, HttpPropertyProvider, JDBCResourceProvider, RootServiceComponentPropertyProvider

    public abstract class BaseProvider
extends Object
    Base provider implementation for both property and resource providers.

      • checkConfigPropertyIds

        protected Set<String> checkConfigPropertyIds(Set<String> base,
                                             String configCategory)
        Checks for property ids that are not recognized by the provider.
        Parameters:
        base - the base set of properties
        configCategory - the config category that would have a desired_config element.
        Returns:
        the set of properties that are NOT known to the provider

        Returns:

        Check to see if the given property id contains replacement arguments (e.g. $1)
        Parameters:

      • isPropertyRequested

        protected static boolean isPropertyRequested(String propertyId,
                                             Set<String> requestedIds)
        Determine whether or not the given property id is part the given set of requested ids. This accounts for the cases where the given properties are actually property categories.
        Parameters:
        propertyId - the property id
        requestedIds - the requested set of property ids
        Returns:
        true if the given property id is part of the given set of requested ids

      • setResourceProperty

        protected static boolean setResourceProperty(Resource resource,
                                             String propertyId,
                                             Object value,
                                             Set<String> requestedIds)
        Set a property value on the given resource for the given id and value. Make sure that the id is in the given set of requested ids.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource
        propertyId - the property id
        value - the value to set
        requestedIds - the requested set of property ids

      • isPropertyEntryRequested

        protected static boolean isPropertyEntryRequested(String propertyId,
                                                  Set<String> requestedIds)
        Determine whether or not any of the requested ids are an entry for the given property, if the given property is a category. For example, if the given property is 'category/subcategory' and the set of requested ids contains 'category/subcategory/property' then this method should return true.
        Parameters:
        propertyId - the property id
        requestedIds - the requested set of property ids
        Returns:
        true if the given property is a category for any of the requested ids

      • isPropertyCategoryRequested

        protected static boolean isPropertyCategoryRequested(String propertyId,
                                                     Set<String> requestedIds)
        Determine whether or not any of the requested ids are a category for the given property. For example, if the given property is 'category/subcategory/property' and the set of requested ids contains 'category' or 'category/subcategory' then this method should return true.
        Parameters:
        propertyId - the property id
        requestedIds - the requested set of property ids
        Returns:
        true if the given property's category is part of the given set of requested ids

      • getPropertyIds

        public Set<String> getPropertyIds()
        Get the property ids supported by this property adapter.
        Returns:
        the property ids supported by this provider

        public Set<String> getCategoryIds()
        Get supported categories
